title: CLIENT CLOSES RIGHT AFTER SIGNING IN !!!
body: Just after logging in my client constantly closess ... And I tried repairing it but it's still the same ... Help pls ?! Any Ideas ? ...

replies.body: Cases like this are usually due to your connection dropping after authentication.  If your connection to the server fails, your login will go away without the client appearing.  For your specific issue, I recommend going through the[ Connection Troubleshoot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.
